OrderSummary.name: OrderSummary
OrderSummary.description: Represents the current properties and state of an order. Corresponds to one or more order objects, consisting of an original object and any change objects applicable to it.

AccountId.description: ID of the account or person account associated with the OrderSummary. It represents the shopper in the storefront.

ActiveProcess​ExceptionCount.description: Total number of active process exceptions on the OrderSummary.

BillingAddress.description: Billing address associated with the OrderSummary.

BillingCountry​Code.description: The ISO country code for the billing address. The default value is US.

BillingEmail​Address.description: Email address on the billing address.

BillingGeocode​Accuracy.description: The accuracy of the geocode for the billing address.

BillingLatitude.description: Used with BillingLongitude to specify the precise geolocation of the billing address. Acceptable values are numbers between –90 and 90 with up to 15 decimal places.

BillingLongitude.description: Used with BillingLatitude to specify the precise geolocation of the billing address. Acceptable values are numbers between –90 and 90 with up to 15 decimal places.

BillingPhoneNumber.description: Phone number of the billing address.

BillingState​Code.description: The ISO state or province code for the billing address.

BillToContactId.description: ID of the Contact associated with the OrderSummary. It represents the shopper in the storefront when not using person accounts.

BusinessModel.description: The business model of the OrderSummary.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Available only with the multicurrency feature enabled. Contains the ISO code for the currency of the original Order associated with the OrderSummary.

EffectiveDate.description: Date at which the order becomes effective. Label is Order Start Date.

ExternalReference​Identifier.description: Used internally to prevent duplicate records. This value is case-sensitive.

GrandTotalAmount.description: Total amount, including adjustments and tax, of the OrderSummary.

IsSuspended.description: Indicates whether the OrderSummary is suspended. The default value is false.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. A null value can mean that this record has only been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OrderedDate.description: Date of the original order associated with this OrderSummary.

OrderLifeCycleType.description: Specifies whether the OrderSummary is managed by Salesforce Order Management (MANAGED) or by an external system (UNMANAGED). An unmanaged OrderSummary is stored in Salesforce for reference purposes. Some Order Management APIs reject input records that are associated with unmanaged OrderSummaries. Order Management does not update financial bucket fields on some records that are associated with unmanaged OrderSummaries. A user with the EditUnmanagedOrderSummaries or B2BCommerceIntegrator permission can edit certain fields on objects related to unmanaged OrderSummaries that are normally only accessible via APIs.

OrderProduct​LineCount.description: Total number of unique products ordered on this Order Summary.

OriginalOrderId.description: ID of the original order associated with this OrderSummary. Label is Original Order.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who currently owns this OrderSummary. Default value is the ID of the user who created the record.

PoDate.description: Purchase order date associated with this OrderSummary.

PoNumber.description: Purchase order number associated with this OrderSummary.

Pricebook2Id.description: ID of the pricebook associated with this OrderSummary.

RoutingAttempts.description: The number of attempts that have been made to route the order summary to inventory locations.

SalesChannelId.description: ID of the SalesChannel associated with this OrderSummary.

SalesStoreId.description: ID of the RetailStore or WebStore associated with this OrderSummary.

SourceProcess.description: Describes the order process that created the OrderSummary.

Status.description: Status of the order summary. Unlike the Status and Status Category fields on the order and FulfillmentOrder objects, this field is optional.

SourceOrderSummaryId.description: ID of the source order summary that’s associated with this OrderSummary.

TaxLocaleType.description: The system used to handle tax on the original Order associated with the OrderSummary. Gross usually applies to taxes like value-added tax (VAT), and Net usually applies to taxes like sales tax. Automatic taxes use currency to determine if the tax is added on top of the price (excluded) or included in the price.

TotalAdjDelivery​AmtWithTax.description: Total amount of all OrderItemSummaries of type Delivery Charge belonging to this OrderSummary, inclusive of item-level adjustments and tax. This amount is equal to TotalAdjustedDeliveryAmount + TotalAdjustedDeliveryTaxAmount.

TotalAdjDistAmount.description: Total of distributed adjustments applied to OrderItemSummaries belonging to this OrderSummary. This amount is equal to TotalProductAdjDistAmount plus TotalDeliveryAdjDistAmount.

TotalAdjDist​AmountWithTax.description: Total of distributed adjustments applied to OrderItemSummaries belonging to this OrderSummary, inclusive of tax. This amount is equal to TotalAdjDistAmount plus TotalAdjDistTaxAmount.

TotalAdjFee​AmtWithTax.description: Total amount of all OrderItemSummaries of type Fee belonging to this OrderSummary, inclusive of item-level adjustments and tax. This amount is equal to TotalAdjustedFeeAmount plus TotalAdjustedFeeTaxAmount.

TotalAdjProduct​AmtWithTax.description: Total amount of all OrderItemSummaries of type code Product belonging to this OrderSummary, inclusive of item-level adjustments and tax. This amount is equal to TotalAdjustedProductAmount plus TotalAdjustedProductTaxAmount.

TotalAdjusted​DeliveryAmount.description: Total, including item-level adjustments but not order-level adjustments or tax, of all OrderItemSummaries of type Delivery Charge belonging to this OrderSummary.

TotalAdjusted​FeeAmount.description: Total, including item-level adjustments but not order-level adjustments or tax, of all OrderItemSummaries of type Fee belonging to this OrderSummary.

TotalAdjusted​Product​Amount.description: Total, including item-level adjustments but not order-level adjustments or tax, of all OrderItemSummaries of type code Product belonging to this OrderSummary.

TotalAmount.description: Total, including adjustments but not tax, of all OrderItemSummaries belonging to this OrderSummary. Equal to TotalAdjustedProductAmount plus TotalAdjustedFeeAmount plus TotalAdjustedDeliveryAmount.

TotalDeliveryAdj​DistAmount.description: Total of all order-level price adjustments applied to OrderItemSummaries of type Delivery Charge belonging to this OrderSummary. This value includes OrderItemAdjustmentLineSummaries that belong to OrderAdjustmentGroupSummaries of type Header.

TotalDeliveryAdj​DistAmtWithTax.description: Total of all order-level price adjustments applied to OrderItemSummaries of type Delivery Charge belonging to this OrderSummary, inclusive of tax. This value includes OrderItemAdjustmentLineSummaries that belong to OrderAdjustmentGroupSummaries of type Header. It is equal to TotalDeliveryAdjDistAmount + TotalDeliveryAdjDistTaxAmount.

TotalDeliveryAmount.description: Sum of the Total Line Amounts of all OrderItemSummaries of type Delivery Charge belonging to this OrderSummary, not including adjustments or tax.

TotalDeliveryAmount​WithTax.description: Total of all OrderItemSummaries of type Delivery Charge belonging to this OrderSummary, including tax but not including adjustments. It is equal to TotalDeliveryAmount + TotalDeliveryTaxAmount.

TotalFeeAdj​DistAmount.description: Total of all order-level price adjustments applied to OrderItemSummaries of type Fee belonging to this OrderSummary. This value includes OrderItemAdjustmentLineSummaries that belong to OrderAdjustmentGroupSummaries of type Header.

TotalFeeAdj​DistAmtWithTax.description: Total of all order-level price adjustments applied to OrderItemSummaries of type Fee belonging to this OrderSummary, inclusive of tax. This value includes OrderItemAdjustmentLineSummaries that belong to OrderAdjustmentGroupSummaries of type Header. It is equal to TotalFeeAdjDistAmount + TotalFeeAdjDistTaxAmount.

TotalFeeAmount.description: Sum of the Total Line Amounts of all OrderItemSummaries of type Fee belonging to this OrderSummary, not including adjustments or tax.

TotalFeeAmount​WithTax.description: Total of all OrderItemSummaries of type Fee belonging to this OrderSummary, including tax but not including adjustments. It is equal to TotalFeeAmount + TotalFeeTaxAmount.

TotalProductAdj​DistAmount.description: Total of all order-level price adjustments applied to OrderItemSummaries of type code Product belonging to this OrderSummary. This value includes OrderItemAdjustmentLineSummaries that belong to OrderAdjustmentGroupSummaries of type Header.

TotalProductAdj​DistAmtWithTax.description: Total of all order-level price adjustments applied to OrderItemSummaries of type code Product belonging to this OrderSummary, inclusive of tax. This value includes OrderItemAdjustmentLineSummaries that belong to OrderAdjustmentGroupSummaries of type Header. It is equal to TotalProductAdjDistAmount + TotalProductAdjDistTaxAmount.

TotalProductAmount.description: Sum of the Total Line Amounts of all OrderItemSummaries of type code Product belonging to this OrderSummary, not including adjustments or tax.

TotalProductAmount​WithTax.description: Total of all OrderItemSummaries of type code Product belonging to this OrderSummary, including tax but not including adjustments. It is equal to TotalProductAmount + TotalProductTaxAmount.

TotalTaxAmount.description: Total tax on all OrderItemSummaries belonging to this OrderSummary. Equal to TotalAdjustedDeliveryTaxAmount plus TotalAdjustedFeeTaxAmount plus TotalAdjustedProductTaxAmount.
